title: President Donald J. Trump Announces Appointments for the Executive Office of the President – The White House
content:
Nominations & Appointments			
Issued on:
June 5, 2020
Today, President Donald J. Trump announced the following appointments for the Executive Office of the President:Amy Swonger will serve as Assistant to the President and Acting Director of the Office of Legislative Affairs.  Cassidy Hutchinson will serve as Special Assistant to the President and Coordinator for Legislative Affairs, Office of the Chief of Staff.
